mapper.sql: id, order_no, item_no, item_count, production_count, order_dtl_status, need_mid_count, updated_by, updated_time, created_by, created_time
mapper.select:
SELECT od.id, od.order_no, od.item_no, od.item_count, od.production_count, od.order_dtl_status, od.need_mid_count, od.updated_by, od.updated_time, od.created_by, od.created_time, mis.item_name FROM t_order_dtl od LEFT JOIN mes_item_stock mis ON od.item_no = mis.item_no
AND od.order_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{p.orderNo}, '%')
AND od.order_dtl_status = #{p.orderDtlStatus}
ORDER BY od.created_time DESC

SELECT od.id, od.order_no, od.item_no, od.item_count, od.production_count, od.order_dtl_status, od.need_mid_count, od.updated_by, od.updated_time, od.created_by, od.created_time, mis.item_name, -- 左连接生产单，拿到生产单里的 item_no（顶层物料） po.item_no AS production_item_no, -- 再左连接 mes_item_stock，拿到顶层物料的 bom_no topMis.bom_no AS top_bom_no FROM t_order_dtl od LEFT JOIN mes_item_stock mis ON od.item_no = mis.item_no LEFT JOIN t_production_order po ON po.sales_order_no = od.order_no LEFT JOIN mes_item_stock topMis ON topMis.item_no = po.item_no
AND od.order_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{p.orderNo}, '%')
AND od.order_dtl_status = #{p.orderDtlStatus}
AND mis.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{p.itemName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
ORDER BY od.created_time DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT d.order_no) FROM t_order_dtl d

SELECT d.id, d.order_no AS orderNo, d.item_no AS itemNo, d.item_count AS itemCount, IFNULL(SUM(wr.real_count),0) AS productionCount, d.order_dtl_status AS orderDtlStatus, d.need_mid_count AS needMidCount, d.updated_by, d.updated_time AS updatedTime, d.created_by, d.created_time AS createdTime, mis.bom_no AS bomNo FROM t_order_dtl d LEFT JOIN mes_item_stock mis ON d.item_no = mis.item_no LEFT JOIN t_work_order wo ON wo.order_dtl_id = d.id LEFT JOIN t_work_report wr ON wr.work_order_id = wo.id AND wr.status = '03'
d.item_no IN
#{itemNo}
AND d.order_dtl_status = #{p.orderStatus}
AND d.created_time >= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{p.beginTime},' 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND d.created_time <= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{p.endTime},' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY d.id ORDER BY d.created_time DESC

select
from t_order_dtl
DATE_FORMAT(created_time,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m') and order_dtl_status <> '06'
and item_no in
#{itemNo}
SELECT max(cast(REPLACE(w.order_no, 'DD-', '') as UNSIGNED INTEGER)) as order_no from t_order_dtl w

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( updated_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) AS updatedTime, sum( production_count ) AS productionCount FROM t_order_dtl WHERE updated_time LIKE concat(#{date},'%') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(updated_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ORDER BY updatedTime
